Name: enforce_team_size_limit
Description: Team size must be greater than 3 and less than 10, as per Scrum guidelines.

Name: respect_sprint_end_date
Description: All work within a sprint must be completed by the sprint's end date.

Name: project_budget_is_a_hard_cap
Description: The total spent on a project cannot exceed its allocated budget.

Name: worker_must_have_skill_for_task
Description: A worker can only be assigned to a task if they possess the required skill for it.

Name: sprint_load_must_not_exceed_velocity
Description: The sum of story points in a sprint backlog should not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: product_owner_manages_one_backlog
Description: The relationship between a Product Owner and a Product Backlog is strictly one-to-one.

Name: epic_must_be_decomposed
Description: An epic cannot be placed into a sprint directly; it must contain at least one user story.

Name: task_assigned_to_one_worker
Description: Each task must be assigned to exactly one worker to ensure clear responsibility.

Name: feature_requires_documentation
Description: Every feature that is part of a release plan must have associated documentation.

Name: worker_availability_is_a_constraint
Description: A worker cannot be assigned more tasks than their availability allows.

Name: blocker_must_be_resolved_to_close_task
Description: A task cannot be marked as 'done' if it has an open blocker associated with it.

Name: sprint_backlog_must_have_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a corresponding sprint goal.
